abstract: Seattle Seahawks coach Pete Carroll takes unconventional approach to game, giving players support, respect and positive reinforcement; gentle, zen-like environment is facilitated by psychologist and 'human optimization specialist' Michael Gervais, who uses New Age platitudes to help players avoid distractions and doubts that could impede their success.
lead_paragraph: Breaking away from football’s harsher motivational techniques, Seattle Coach Pete Carroll fosters an atmosphere of positive reinforcement and Zen-like focus.

headline.main: No Foul Mouths on This Field: Football With a New Age Twist
headline.print_headline: No Foul Mouths on This Field: Football With a New Age Twist
